attributes.action: MP’s and members of the Lord’s be reduced to correlate with the number of MEP’s.
attributes.additional_details: The evidence is in the OPCS publications on population growth caused by immigration and freedom of movement within the EU.
attributes.background: We are being ruled by Europe so we may as well accept this and stop pretending we are a sovereign nation.

rejection.details: We're not sure what you mean by "correlate with the number of MEPs". There are 751 MEPs in the European Parliament. It's not clear whether you would like the total number of MPs and members of the House of Lords in the UK to be 751, and if so how many members you think each House should have.
